alert.note: Alert for Yavapai (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued August 27 at 4:07PM MST until August 27 at 5:15PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING FOR THE AGUA FRIA RIVER REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 515 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON FOR YAVAPAI COUNTY... At 400 PM MST, gauge reports indicated over a 4 foot rise on the Agua Fria River near Cordes Junction, which will continue to move southward toward Black Canyon City. The public has reported flooding of Black Canyon Creek in Black Canyon City over Maren Avenue. Flash flooding is already occurring. HAZARD...Life-threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding in and around the Agua Fria River. SOURCE...Gauges reported. IMPACT...Life threatening flash flooding of areas in and around the Agua Fria River. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Black Canyon City, Hazlett Hollow Campground and Turney Gulch Group Campground. This includes the following highways... Interstate 17 between mile markers 243 and 247. This includes the following creeks, washes and rivers... Antelope Creek, Agua Fria River, Black Canyon, Silver Creek, Sycamore Creek, Rock Creek, Slate Creek, Larry Creek, Black Canyon Creek, Badger Spring Wash, Tank Creek, Willow Creek, Jim Creek, Squaw Creek, Indian Creek, Ash Creek, Big Bug Creek, Boulder Creek, North Fork Rock Creek, Castle Creek, Poland Creek, Bishop Creek and Humbug Creek. FLASH FLOOD...GAUGE INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Immediately move out of and away from creeks and washes in the Agua Fria River. Flash flooding is occurring or imminent. Turn Around, Don`t Drown if you encounter flood waters while driving. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
